name: Fantasy Land: Pocket Aces
description:
If you like card games, you might enjoy this new digital #card battle game! Face off against 38 computer opponents with a deck built from 340 cards you can collect, or build two of your own decks and watch the computer play them, or play against another human! You'll travel across a colorful world and meet some wacky individuals as you collect cards and defeat the Kings and Queens of the four houses.

Use the left mouse button to select things, and the right mouse button to cancel. On Android, tapping something selects it, and double tapping cancels.

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org

The characters 'Spadefox', 'Verona', 'Ozzgard', 'Vengeance', and 'Viridian' are the creations of Gatonom - https://gatonom.deviantart.com/

Ephraim225 here! This is a re-upload of the first full game I ever released, first published in December of 2017. Feels like forever ago. Originally available on GameJolt, I've added it to my Itch page.
